title: Shadow of a Doubt
description: A teenage girl, overjoyed when her favorite uncle comes to visit the family in their quiet California town, slowly begins to suspect that he is in fact the "Merry Widow" murderer sought by the authorities.

title: The Ox-Bow Incident
description: When a posse captures three men suspected of killing a local cattle rancher, they become divided on whether to lynch the men or turn them over to justice.

title: The Life and Death of Colonel Blimp
description: Portrays in warm-hearted detail the life and loves of one extraordinary man, Clive Candy, who travels through the Boer War and World War I to the present day.

title: The Song of Bernadette
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
description: In 1858 France, a peasant girl has visions of the Virgin Mary at a grotto in Lourdes.

title: Day of Wrath
description: In a 17th-century Danish village, an old woman is accused of witchcraft. In the shadow of her flight, the pastor's young wife falls in love with his son.

title: Le Corbeau
description: A French village doctor becomes the target of poison-pen letters sent by a mysterious stalker known as 'The Raven'.

title: Heaven Can Wait
description: A rake arrives in Hell and tells the Devil his life story to prove that he belongs there, but the Devil has his doubts.

title: Watch on the Rhine
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: A German-born engineer, his American wife and their children travel from Mexico to the United States to visit her brother but are pursued by Nazi agents.

title: The More the Merrier
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: During the World War II housing shortage in Washington D.C., two men rent a room in a single woman's apartment and the older man plays matchmaker.

title: For Whom the Bell Tolls
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: During the Spanish Civil War, an American allied with the Republicans finds romance during a desperate mission to blow up a strategically important bridge.

title: Sahara
description: After the fall of Tobruk in 1942, an American tank crew attempts to rejoin their unit through the Libyan desert, picking up an assortment of survivors along the way.

title: The Human Comedy
description: A teenage boy growing up in a small town in California during World War II delivers telegrams to families with loved ones serving overseas.

title: Jane Eyre
description: After a harsh childhood, orphan Jane Eyre is hired by Edward Rochester, the brooding lord of a mysterious manor house, to care for his young daughter.

title: Lassie Come Home
description: After her destitute family is forced to sell her, a collie named Lassie escapes from her new owner and begins a long trek from Scotland to her Yorkshire home.

title: Five Graves to Cairo
description: After the fall of Tobruk, a British soldier stumbles into a desert hotel, poses as a waiter, and attempts to steal Rommel's war plans.

title: I Walked with a Zombie
description: A Canadian nurse is hired to care for the wife of a sugar plantation owner on a Caribbean island, where she encounters voodoo and family secrets.

title: The Seventh Victim
description: A young woman travels to New York City to find her missing sister and uncovers a Satanic cult.

title: The Phantom of the Opera
description: A disfigured violinist haunts the Paris Opera House and will stop at nothing to make his beloved understudy the star.

title: Frankenstein Meets the Wolf Man
description: Lawrence Talbot, the Wolf Man, seeks a cure for his affliction and crosses paths with Frankenstein's Monster.

title: Air Force
description: The crew of the bomber Mary-Ann fights its way across the Pacific in the aftermath of Pearl Harbor.

title: Destination Tokyo
description: A US Navy submarine is sent on a secret mission to Tokyo Bay to gather information for the Doolittle Raid.

title: Hangmen Also Die!
description: A Czech resistance fighter assassinates a Nazi leader and must hide from the Gestapo while the citizens of Prague endure brutal reprisals.

title: This Land Is Mine
description: A timid schoolteacher in a Nazi-occupied country finds the courage to stand up to the oppressors and inspire his fellow citizens.

title: Ossessione
description: A drifter begins an affair with the wife of a restaurant owner and they plot to murder her husband. An unauthorized adaptation of 'The Postman Always Rings Twice'.

title: Sanshiro Sugata
description: A young man struggles to learn the way of Judo and to control his own strength and temper in 1880s Japan.

title: Cabin in the Sky
description: A gambler is given six months to redeem his soul and prove he is worthy of entering Heaven.

title: Stormy Weather
description: A musical revue featuring some of the top African-American performers of the era, loosely based on the life of Bill 'Bojangles' Robinson.

title: Girl Crazy
description: A young playboy is sent to a western college where he falls for the dean's daughter and tries to save the school from closing.

title: The Gang's All Here
description: A soldier on leave falls for a chorus girl, but complications arise when his wealthy fiancée shows up.

title: Madame Curie
description: A biography of the scientist Marie Curie and her discovery of radium with her husband Pierre.

title: Old Acquaintance
description: Two childhood friends, one a serious writer and the other a flighty woman, navigate love, careers, and rivalry over two decades.

title: Holy Matrimony
description: A famous painter poses as his dead valet to escape publicity and marries a woman through a correspondence agency.

title: Princess O'Rourke
description: A European princess in New York falls for an American pilot, but has to hide her identity.

title: Action in the North Atlantic
description: A merchant marine ship is torpedoed by a German U-boat, and the crew must fight to survive and complete their mission.

title: Edge of Darkness
description: The residents of a Norwegian village resist the Nazi occupation forces.

title: Sherlock Holmes Faces Death
description: Sherlock Holmes investigates a series of murders at a convalescent home for officers, where the victims are being killed in a manner resembling a strange family ritual.

title: The Spider Woman
description: Sherlock Holmes investigates a series of suicides that are actually murders committed by a woman using deadly spiders.

title: Sherlock Holmes in Washington
description: Holmes travels to Washington D.C. to find a missing microfilm before it falls into Nazi hands.

title: Fires Were Started
description: A documentary-style film depicting the work of the Auxiliary Fire Service in London during the Blitz.

title: Millions Like Us
description: A young woman works in an aircraft factory during World War II and falls in love with a Royal Air Force gunner.

title: So Proudly We Hail!
description: A group of nurses returning from the war in the Philippines recall their experiences.

title: Bataan
description: A small group of American soldiers try to blow up a bridge to stop the Japanese advance on the Bataan peninsula.

title: Guadalcanal Diary
description: The story of the United States Marines who fought in the Battle of Guadalcanal.

title: Crash Dive
description: Two naval officers compete for the same woman while commanding a submarine on a dangerous mission in the North Atlantic.

title: The North Star
description: A Ukrainian village tries to defend itself against the Nazi invasion.

title: The Constant Nymph
description: A sickly teenager falls in love with a composer who marries her cousin.

title: Münchhausen
description: The adventures of the famous Baron Munchausen, who travels to Russia, Turkey, and the Moon.

title: A Guy Named Joe
description: A pilot is killed in combat but returns as a ghost to mentor a new pilot and watch over his former girlfriend.

title: The Man in Grey
description: A brutal lord marries a sweet young woman for her money, then takes her best friend as his mistress.

title: Meshes of the Afternoon
description: A woman's dream state involves a series of repetitive and symbolic events.

title: My Friend Flicka
description: A young boy tries to raise a wild horse.
